sentences.en: A mirror hung on a nail above the washstand.
sentences.cn: 脸盆架上方用钉子挂着一面镜子。

sentences.en: Contemporary photographs are juxtaposed with a sixteenth century, copper Portuguese mirror.
sentences.cn: 几幅当代照片和一面16世纪的葡萄牙铜镜并排摆在一起。

sentences.en: Despite the fact that I have tried to be objective, the book inevitably mirrors my own interests and experiences.
sentences.cn: 尽管我曾努力做到客观，但这本书还是不可避免地反映出了我自己的兴趣和经历。

sentences.en: Elaine braced herself against the dresser and looked in the mirror.
sentences.cn: 伊莱恩紧贴着衣橱照镜子。

sentences.en: He caught sight of his hair in a mirror.
sentences.cn: 他从镜子里看见了自己的头发。

sentences.en: He looked up into the mirror as he changed through his gears.
sentences.cn: 他一边换挡，一边抬眼看后视镜。

sentences.en: He spends hours in front of the mirror !
sentences.cn: 他老是照镜子！

sentences.en: He was staring into the mirror above him.
sentences.cn: 他盯着在他上方的镜子。

sentences.en: Henry’s sad smile mirrored that of his son.
sentences.cn: 亨利脸上那苦涩的笑容跟他儿子一模一样。

sentences.en: His image seemed to be reflected many times in the mirror.
sentences.cn: 那面镜子里好像映现出很多个他的影像。

sentences.en: I couldn't bear to see my reflection in the mirror.
sentences.cn: 我不忍看镜子里自己的样子。

sentences.en: I run the water very hot, clouding the mirror.
sentences.cn: 我把水开得很热，水汽模糊了镜面。

sentences.en: I saw in him a mirror image of my younger self.
sentences.cn: 我在他身上看见了年轻时的自己。

sentences.en: I walked over to the mirror and stuck my tongue out.
sentences.cn: 我走到镜子前面伸出舌头。

sentences.en: Light colours provide an effective backdrop for pictures or a mirror.
sentences.cn: 浅色是挂放图画或镜子很有效果的衬托。

sentences.en: She stood in front of the misted-up mirror.
sentences.cn: 她站在蒙着一层水汽的镜子前。

sentences.en: The economic recovery in Britain was mirrored in the US.
sentences.cn: 美国出现了和英国相似的经济复苏。

sentences.en: The only wall decorations are candles and a single mirror.
sentences.cn: 墙上唯一的装饰是几支蜡烛和一面镜子。

sentences.en: This is almost the mirror image of the situation in Scotland.
sentences.cn: 这几乎就是苏格兰局势的翻版。

sentences.en: We believe the polls are an accurate mirror of public opinion.
sentences.cn: 我们相信民意测验是准确反映公众意见的一面镜子。

sentences.en: When I looked in the mirror I couldn’t believe it. I looked fantastic!
sentences.cn: 我看着镜子简直不敢相信，我看上去棒极了！

words.tran_cn: 反映（mirror的过去式和过去分词）；反射

phrases.tran_cn: 抛物柱面镜；抛物面反射镜

trans.tran_cn: 镜子，反光镜，真实的写照，反映，借鉴，榜样
trans.tran_en: a piece of special glass that you can look at and see yourself in
if one thing mirrors another, it is very similar to it and may seem to copy or represent it
If something mirrors something else, it has similar features to it, and therefore seems like a copy or representation of it
